org.deeplearning4j.nn.weights

Enum WeightInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WeightInit>
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.weights.WeightInit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WeightInit>

    public enum WeightInit
extends java.lang.Enum<WeightInit>
    Weight initialization scheme Distribution: Sample weights from a distribution based on shape of input Normalized: Normalize sample weights Size: Sample weights from bound uniform distribution using shape for min and max Uniform: Sample weights from bound uniform distribution (specify min and max) VI: Sample weights from variance normalized initialization (Glorot) Zeros: Generate weights as zeros Xavier: RELU: N(0,2/nIn): He et al. (2015), Delving Deep into Rectifiers
